scripts.start: cp src/decoder/missile.wasm ./dist/missile.wasm && cp src/demuxer/missilets.wasm ./dist/missilets.wasm && cp -r src/assets dist && browserify src/h265webjs.js -o ./dist/h265webjs.js && browserify ./play.js -o ./dist/play.js && node server.js
scripts.dist: cp src/decoder/missile.wasm ./dist/missile.wasm && cp src/demuxer/missilets.wasm ./dist/missilets.wasm && cp -r src/assets dist && browserify src/h265webjs.js -o ./dist/h265webjs.js
